meanings.user_prompt: A guy with brown skin and dark hair running across a footbridge in japan doing the naruto run.
At a pool party, a guy with light brown hair flipping into a pool with everyone watching.
A woman of 60 with dark hair upset whilst a bald guy with small rounded glasses tries to comfort her.
It's getting dark and dangerous, a bald guy with small round glasses is running home.
meanings.sentence_attachment: It's getting dark so I need to go home
